title: PTC (Paid-To-Click) Website with Ad Watching Rewards

requirements.text: Create a user registration and login system using Internet Identity, storing user profiles (username, email, registration date, balance) in the backend.

quotes: Ptc website for me which gives 100 dollars per ad watch

acceptanceCriteria: Users can register and log in via Internet Identity
User profile is created on first login with initial balance of $0
User profile data (username, balance, join date) is persisted in backend

requirements.text: Implement an ad listing system where the backend stores available ads (title, description, ad URL, duration in seconds, reward amount set to $100). Provide at least 5 sample ads pre-loaded.

quotes: Ptc website for me which gives 100 dollars per ad watch

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores a list of ads with title, description, URL, duration, and reward fields
At least 5 sample ads are pre-loaded
Each ad has a reward value of $100

requirements.text: Build an ad watching flow: users see a list of available ads, click to watch an ad (displayed in an embedded iframe or video player with a countdown timer matching the ad duration), and after the timer completes a 'Claim Reward' button appears. Clicking it credits $100 to the user's balance. Each ad can only be claimed once per user per day.
acceptanceCriteria: Available ads page lists all active ads with title, reward amount, and duration
Clicking an ad opens a full-screen or modal view with a countdown timer
The 'Claim Reward' button is disabled/hidden until the countdown reaches zero
Claiming an ad adds exactly $100 to the user's balance
The same ad cannot be claimed more than once per day per user
Already-watched ads for the day are marked as completed

requirements.text: Create a user dashboard page showing: total earnings balance, number of ads watched today, total ads watched all-time, daily earnings summary, and a list of recent reward transactions with timestamps.

quotes: Ptc website for me which gives 100 dollars per ad watch

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays current balance prominently
Shows count of ads watched today vs. total
Transaction history shows each reward with ad title, amount, and date/time
Data is fetched from the backend and updates after each ad claim

requirements.text: Implement a withdrawal request system where users can request a payout of their earned balance (minimum withdrawal $500). Requests are stored in the backend with status (pending/approved/rejected). Display withdrawal history in the user dashboard.

quotes: Ptc website for me which gives 100 dollars per ad watch

acceptanceCriteria: Users can submit a withdrawal request specifying amount (minimum $500)
Withdrawal request is saved in backend with 'pending' status
User's available balance is reduced by the requested amount upon submission
Withdrawal history is visible in the dashboard with status labels
Users cannot withdraw more than their current balance

requirements.text: Apply a bold, energetic visual theme using rich gold and dark navy colors with modern card-based layouts, glowing accent highlights, and clear call-to-action buttons. Use a clean sans-serif typography hierarchy and enforce the theme consistently across all pages including landing, dashboard, ads list, and withdrawal pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses dark navy backgrounds with gold/amber accents
All pages share consistent header, navigation, and card styles
CTA buttons use bold gold styling with hover effects
Typography is clean and legible with clear visual hierarchy

requirements.text: Build a public landing page that explains the platform (earn $100 per ad watched), displays key stats (total users, total paid out), and includes a prominent sign-up/login call-to-action using Internet Identity.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page has a hero section with headline and sign-up CTA
Features section explains how earning works step by step
Stats section shows platform metrics
Not-logged-in users are directed to the landing page; logged-in users go to dashboard

constraints: Use Internet Identity for authentication only — no username/password auth
All data persistence must use the Motoko backend canister
No real payment processing — balances and withdrawals are tracked on-chain as demo data
nonGoals: Real money transfers or integration with payment processors
Admin panel for approving withdrawals (withdrawals remain in pending state)

required: Bold hero banner with gold coins, dollar signs, and a glowing click cursor on a dark navy gradient background (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Gold trophy cup icon with sparkle effects on transparent background (trophy-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Stylized dollar sign badge icon with gold and navy colors on transparent background (earn-icon.dim_128x128.png)
